Sequence Information.Target Organism: [Ref.19253295]Gram-negative bacterium (LS, HS):Escherichia coli ML35p (MIC=0.65, >20 µmol/L);Gram-positive bacteria:(LS, HS):Listeria monocytogenes EGD (MIC=0.65, >20 µmol/L), Methicillin-resistant Staphylococcus aureus ATCC 33591 (MIC=5.6, >20 µmol/L).Yeast:Candida albicans (MIC=5.2, >20 µmol/L).NOTE:LS (low salt):10 mmol/L sodium phosphate buffer (pH 7.4) and HS (high salt):10 mmol/L sodium-phosphate buffer (pH 7.4), 0.1 mol/L sodium chloride.
Sequence Information.Hemolytic Activity: [Ref.19253295] It has no hemolytic activity against human erythrocytes up to 25 mmol/L
Sequence Information.Cytotoxicity: No cytotoxicity information found in the reference(s) presented
Sequence Information.Function: Has antimicrobial activity against the Gram-positive bacteria methicillin-resistant S. aureus ATCC 33591 and L. monocytogenes EGD, the Gram-negative bacterium E. coli ML53p and the yeast C. albicans 820. Has no hemolytic activity towards human erythrocytes.

Literature.Title: Isolation, purification and de novo sequencing of TBD-1, the first beta-defensin from leukocytes of reptiles.
Literature.Author: Stegemann C, Kolobov A Jr, Leonova YF, Knappe D, Shamova O, Ovchinnikova TV, Kokryakov VN, Hoffmann R.
